title: Target To Lay Off Thousands, Restructure
teaser: The retail giant says most of the layoffs will be at its headquarters, as part of a restructuring plan that aims to save $2 billion over two years.
contentencoded:
Retail giant Target has announced that it will lay off thousands of employees, mainly in the company’s headquarters, as part of a restructuring plan that aims to save $2 billion over two years.

Retail analyst Sucharita Mulpuru of Forrester Research says there’s competition for every dollar and. many large retailers are restructuring in order to be leaner and more competitive.
